item.title: How to add objects
item.dc:creator: @burg355 burg355
item.description:
@burg355 wrote:

Okk ure tryin to add objects ?

search in your Client.Java

makeGlobalObject(

This Should Come Up With Something Like This

makeGlobalObject(coordx, coordy, objectid, -2, 10);

Okk copy n paste one…

change coord x to what u want

coordy to wat u want

then the object id

-2 = which way the object faces

0= WEST | -1 = NORTH | -2 = EAST | -3 = SOUTH

10 = what type of object it is…

ObjectType: 0-3 wall objects, 4-8 wall decoration, 9: diag. walls, 10-11 world objects, 12-21: roofs, 22: floor decoration.

If U Dont Understand add me on msn

or if u need ask anuva question

cd3@hotmail.co.uk

Read full topic
